title: Stochastic Calculus and Anticommuting Variables
abstract: A theory of integration for anticommuting paths is described. This is combined with standard It\^o calculus to give a geometric theory of Brownian paths on curved supermanifolds. (Invited lecture given at meeting on `Espaces de Lacets', Institut de Recherche Math\'ematique Advanc\'ee, Universit\'e Louis Pasteur, Strasbourg, June 1994.)
